title: Private room/bathroom in medical centre
posting_body: ['3 bedroom/2 baths house with 1 unfurnished room available.', 'Bathroom will be shared.', 'Large fenced backyard.', 'Utilities (gas, water electricity) will be split.', 'Willing to discuss utilities included for $475 per month).', 'We take care of lawn services.', 'My husband, 4 year old son, and I live in the home.', 'We have 2 small dogs and 1 ferret in the home.', 'We may ask that you complete a background check since we do have a child in the home.', 'We are looking for someone long term (at least 6 months), but are willing to explore month to month options (at a rate of 700 per month) depending on the situation.', 'We are are a quiet and easy going family.', 'We do occasionally have friends over for dinner or game nights.', 'Both my husband and I have full time jobs.']
